dynamic_line: [The Craber does not immediately pay attention to you. You are met by his serious gaze] What?...

responses.text: I would like to buy weapons or clothes, do you have anything to offer?

dynamic_line: You're just in time, buddy... We had an order from Carnival, and they stole the black silk. Find him, then we'll talk about the reward

responses.text: Itâ€™s all very muddy, I refuse

dynamic_line: To do this, you need to contact Sayo-san, or Master Jin, or Master Yang. They are in charge of questions regarding the acquisition of things or weapons
